001.name: Testo
001.text: I will be helping the dev with making sure that everything is working correctly, or if anything breaks i must tell him about it.

002.name: Testo
002.text: I really like doing it, because it makes me feel so alive when i'm doing it, I actually love to help others!

003.name: Testo
003.text: I'm happy to be able to do this for a living today.

004.name: Testo
004.text: Anyway, I was introducing you to this demo, i'm sorry, sometimes i ramble a bit too much.

005.name: Testo
005.text: I would like you to meet [character name=Testa]Testa[/character]. She is also going to be helping you along with me! Isn't it great?

006.name: Testa
006.text: That is righty, [character name=Testo]Testo[/character]! I am going to be helping the dev as well, hope I can be useful, because I'm new here, please be patient with me!

007.name: Testa
007.text: First of all, look at all my emotions, wink wink.

009.name: Testa
009.text: Ok, i'll stop now. but as we know already, this is just a test conversation..
